author: sboag
msg: Protect call of endElement inside a finally call, which *helps* with
hung transforms in piped transform scenarios.

author: sboag
msg: Check for null entities and entity, partly as defensive check if
setDTD has not been called, and also simply for a miss.

author: sboag
msg: Optimize for "/foo/baz" patterns.  Add canTraverseOutsideSubtree support.

author: sboag
msg: Add canTraverseOutsideSubtree method, which will be part of
the infrastructure for being able to prune used source tree nodes,
